findings.detail: Schema version bumped to 1.1 while `market_risk/reporting.py:14` remains 1.0; docs/roadmap call for shared schema versioning, so mixed versions can confuse downstream validators or tooling. Consider centralizing the version or bumping both.

Metrics extraction only accepts int/float, so numeric types like Decimal or numpy scalars would be silently dropped (including stderr), preventing CI fields. Consider numbers.Real or a safe float() coercion.
No assertions cover the new stderr/CI columns in CSV/HTML outputs; tests only validate in-memory trade results. Add coverage for report file outputs to avoid regressions.

notes: Tests observed: python -m pytest tests/test_reporting.py (per tester).
